name: Knight Runner (Aashutosh Srivastava)
description:
This is my first game which is an Endless Runner one  where a Knight is the player and a bunch of enemies to hit the player.

Can only be played on pc

Player controls:->

1) Jump - Press Spacebar

2) Attacking with sword - Press 'Z'

3)Forward and Backward Movement - Press arrow keys

Background music(Monkeys Spinning Monkeys) by Kevin MacLeod
